## Checklist

- [ ] I read `./.local/INDEX.md` first
- [ ] I read `./.local/CONTEXT_MEMORY.md`
- [ ] I understand and will follow `./.local/RULES.md`
- [ ] I read `./.local/WORKLOG_RULE.md`
- [ ] I used keywords in task files (`./.local/DEV_SKILLSETS.md`)
- [ ] If this is my first PR: I added `./.local/ack/<my_name>.md`
- [ ] I added a dated worklog entry to `.local/worklog/<my_name>.md`
